mechachrome.registration.app

Class Appointment

  • java.lang.Object
    • mechachrome.registration.app.Appointment

  • public class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
    Appointment Class. Appointment Class is used to create an Appointment object which has a Patient class object, Doctor class object and time slot String inside.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeDoc(Doctor dr)
      Method used to change appointment Doctor object.
      void changeTimeSlot(java.lang.String tslot)
      Method used to change time slot String.
      void details()
      Prints out details of appointment.
      Doctor getDoctor()
      Getter for Doctor object attribute.
      Patient getPatient()
      Getter for Patient object attribute Gets Patient object from appointment object.
      java.lang.String getTimeSlotApp()
      Getter for time slot attribute.
      java.lang.String message()
      Prints out appointment message.
      java.lang.String showDocAppointment()
      Shows appointment from Doctors perspective.
      java.lang.String showPatAppointment()
      Shows appointment from Patients perspective.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • message

        public java.lang.String message()
        Prints out appointment message. Message contains information about appointment.
        Returns:
        String message with appointment details

      • getTimeSlotApp

        public java.lang.String getTimeSlotApp()
        Getter for time slot attribute. Gets time slot from appointment object.
        Returns:
        String time slot

      • getPatient

        public Patient getPatient()
        Getter for Patient object attribute Gets Patient object from appointment object.
        Returns:
        Patient object

      • getDoctor

        public Doctor getDoctor()
        Getter for Doctor object attribute. Gets Doctor object from appointment.
        Returns:
        Doctor object

      • details

        public void details()
        Prints out details of appointment. Prints out Doctor object work name and time slot

      • showDocAppointment

        public java.lang.String showDocAppointment()
        Shows appointment from Doctors perspective.
        Returns:
        a String with Patient object name attribute and surname attribute and time slot.

      • showPatAppointment

        public java.lang.String showPatAppointment()
        Shows appointment from Patients perspective.
        Returns:
        a String with time slot and Doctor object name attribute and surname attribute.

      • changeDoc

        public void changeDoc(Doctor dr)
        Method used to change appointment Doctor object.
        Parameters:
        dr - the new Doctor object for appointment.

      • changeTimeSlot

        public void changeTimeSlot(java.lang.String tslot)
        Method used to change time slot String.
        Parameters:
        tslot - new time slot String for appointment.
